headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Newmont After Its 173% Rally In 2025?
summary: Wondering if Newmont is still attractive after its big run, or if you might be late to the party? This article will walk through what the current price really implies. The stock has surged recently, climbing 5.3% over the last week, 21.0% over the past month, and an eye catching 172.9% year to date, with a 178.0% gain over the last year that has sharply changed how the market is pricing its prospects. Those moves have come as investors refocus on gold as a hedge in an uncertain macro...
